bibl.title: Priestly Allowances in the Temple of Jeme.
bibl.note: O. Ashm. Inv. D. 702 (Thebes, early Roman period). List of amounts of wheat received by two women and four men (likely priestesses and priests) from the granary of the god Jeme. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Maha Akeel, Priestly Allowances in the Temple of Jeme.

O. Ashm. Inv. D. 702 (Thebes, early Roman period). List of amounts of wheat received by two women and four men (likely priestesses and priests) from the granary of the god Jeme. - Avec résumé en anglais.
